title: 90/11/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 December 1989 amending Decision 85/446/EEC concerning the on-the-spot inspections to be carried out in respect of the intra- Community trade in fresh meat
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 December 1989
amending Decision 85/446/EEC concerning the on-the-spot inspections to be carried out in respect of the intra-Community trade in fresh meat
(90/11/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Article 11 of Decision 85/446/EEC is hereby repealed.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 2012/64.
(2) OJ No L 382, 31. 12. 1988, p. 3.
(3) OJ No L 260, 2. 10. 1985, p. 19.
(4) OJ No L 49, 21. 2. 1989, p. 36.
